title: Heraldic armour
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Heraldic armour

Heraldic armour may refer to:

  • Heraldic armour, reward from Treasure Trails.
    • Black heraldic armour, equipment obtained from level 1 Treasure Trails and requiring 10 Defence
    • Adamant heraldic armour, equipment obtained from level 2 Treasure Trails and requiring 30 Defence
    • Rune heraldic armour, equipment obtained from level 3 Treasure Trails and requiring 40 Defence
  • Painted heraldic armour, armour painted with heraldic crests at a pluming stand in a player-owned house.
    • Heraldic helmet
    • Heraldic kiteshield
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.

*Painted heraldic armour, armour painted with heraldic crests at a [[pluming stand]] in a [[player-owned house]].
